p: Acute oral toxicity of polymatin A ( 2) in normal healthy rats at doses assayed (0.7, 1.4 and 2.8 g dried powder/kg b.w.) do not produced deaths or acute toxic effect (changes in behavior or posture, presence of convulsions or occurrence of secretions) within 14 days. The doses were well tolerated and did not produce adverse nutritional effect. No gastrointestinal symptom such as diarrhea or constipation were observed at the doses assayed. Volume, pH and urine specific gravity were within normal ranges. No nitrites, protein or blood were detected in the urine samples of the animal groups treated ( Serra-Barcellona et al., 2014).
